title: Auto-Generate Quote Line Items on Quote Creation
overview: When a Quote is created on an Opportunity, the automation generates Quote Line Items from the Opportunity Products.
whenToUse: Use $Joiner to left-join the parent (source) with its related records, then use the joined data to act on the target object. Applicable across all rule engines: #Trigger, #Data List, #Action Button, #Data Loader or #Batch.
